name: C137
description:
C137 is a space adventure game developed by Space-Y. In the game you take control of the space ship Twinkles as the Dark Lord Mclovin. Your mission is to destroy Covid by helping planets on the way and collecting relics that power you up. Be careful for random enemy convoys! They are dangerous but destroying them will be rewarding. Covid is an illithid so it will mess with your ship controls, be careful and watch out for health pickups it drop on the way.

Controls - W,A,S,D - movement / Left Mouse Button - shoot / Space - break
